text: Hanna Maron (; 22 November 1923 - 30 May 2014) was an Israeli actress and stage actress. Maron was known for her stage roles in Pygmalion, The Glass Menagerie and Hello, Dolly!, as well as several plays by Nathan Alterman. Hanna (Meierzak) Maron was born in Berlin, Germany, and moved to Mandatory Palestine in 1933 after Hitler came to power. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Berlin Category:German Jews Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli stage actors Category:Israeli television actors Category:Jewish Israeli actors Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Refugees from Nazism
title: Hanna Maron
